title: Atari 2600 Emulator plus 7.192 Roms!
description:
The Atari 2600 Video Computer System (VCS), occurred in 1977, and was the most popular video game system early in the '80.Now you can play all your favorite games of Atari 2600 on your PC, with the Stella emulator!in this torrent you will find the stella emulator for 32-bit and 64-bit Windows as well as all the games of the Atari 2600 !have fun!


Instructions:

After download and unzip the rar file will  develope a folder.Open the and install the corresponding stella emulator depending on the windows that you have:stella-3.0-win32 for 32-bit windows and stella-3.0-x64 for 64-bit.During the installation you will be asked if you want to create a shortcut to your desktop,you are proposing to create.At the end of the installation click the icon that has been created in your desktop you work.This opens the emulator, in the window that will get you need to find the folder with the game called"All Atari 2600 Roms" .After you find the folder you develope the list with the games,with a double click on the title of the game you can play.If you want fullscreen press Alt-Enter ,the control keys are the cursor keys(the cross)for the direction the firebutton is Space and the F1 option gamers-level end with F2 the game begins.The output from the game you join with the Esc key.This is, of course, you can change if you want from the Options, (supported and joypad) .good game!

System requirements:

- Pentium class machine required.OpenGL accelerated video card are recommended.
-Enough RAM for the operating system 16MB RAM for the emulation. 32MB recommended.
-15 Minimum bit color.Color 16 bit graphics card recommended.
-O. S runs on all Windows 32-bit and 64-bit.
